Name: Palermo
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: This cocktail beautifully combines vanilla rum with tart wine and the richness of pineapple juice. Best made with a lightly aged (1-3 year old) light rum infused with a vanilla pod rather than a commercially produced vanilla-flavoured rum.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2001 at Hotel du Vin, Bristol, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Palermo contains 177 calories
